mapper.select: select id, service_agreement_identifier, service_agreement_name, service_agreement_desc, service_agreement_version, service_agreement_org, service_agreement_org_name, data_service_code, data_service, create_time, update_time, service_file_name, service_file_store_url, service_interface_url, service_interface_http_method, service_resp_file_name, service_resp_file_store_url, service_agreement_lang_type, wsdl_xml, open_api_json, deleted from service_engine.service_agreement where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into service_engine.service_agreement(service_agreement_identifier, service_agreement_name, service_agreement_desc, service_agreement_version, service_agreement_org, service_agreement_org_name, data_service_code, data_service, create_time, update_time, service_file_name, service_file_store_url, service_interface_url, service_interface_http_method, service_resp_file_name, service_resp_file_store_url, service_agreement_lang_type, wsdl_xml, open_api_json, deleted) values (#{serviceAgreementIdentifier}, #{serviceAgreementName}, #{serviceAgreementDesc}, #{serviceAgreementVersion}, #{serviceAgreementOrg}, #{serviceAgreementOrgName}, #{dataServiceCode}, #{dataService}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{serviceFileName}, #{serviceFileStoreUrl}, #{serviceInterfaceUrl}, #{serviceInterfaceHttpMethod}, #{serviceRespFileName}, #{serviceRespFileStoreUrl}, #{serviceAgreementLangType}, #{wsdlXml}, #{openApiJson}, #{deleted})
mapper.update:
update service_engine.service_agreement
service_agreement_identifier = #{serviceAgreementIdentifier},
service_agreement_name = #{serviceAgreementName},
service_agreement_desc = #{serviceAgreementDesc},
service_agreement_version = #{serviceAgreementVersion},
service_agreement_org = #{serviceAgreementOrg},
service_agreement_org_name = #{serviceAgreementOrgName},
data_service_code = #{dataServiceCode},
data_service = #{dataService},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
service_file_name = #{serviceFileName},
service_file_store_url = #{serviceFileStoreUrl},
service_interface_url = #{serviceInterfaceUrl},
service_interface_http_method = #{serviceInterfaceHttpMethod},
service_resp_file_name = #{serviceRespFileName},
service_resp_file_store_url = #{serviceRespFileStoreUrl},
service_agreement_lang_type = #{serviceAgreementLangType},
wsdl_xml = #{wsdlXml},
open_api_json = #{openApiJson},
deleted = #{deleted},
where id = #{id}
